item.title: Flight-X: Booking Flow
item.description:
Search, Quote and Book transactions must be executed sequentally in order to book an Offer in a Seller. At this moment, the Search transaction is the only operative for test pourposes. We will laungh the other transactions in future releases of our product. In the following steps you will find the information about our current operating transactions. You can also consult the Schema through our API playground besides to launch requests.
[...]
